data.persona: I am in a group of other chickens. I enjoy making noise. I lay an egg once a day.
data.description:
You are in the Cottage.
The small cottage was white with two, shuttered windows. It was in the unique shape of a circle and was built of plaster. Smoke billowed from the chimney.
There's a shuttered windows, a dinner table, and a chimney here.
The the man is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am making noise so the farmer knows I want the shuttered windows opened
data.mid_motivation: I need the shuttered windows open so I can go in and out of the cottage
data.long_motivation: I want to be protected from rain and the cold in winter and the cottage will protect me.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: use my beak  with my feet to hit the shutters

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use my voice with loud sounds to shriek at the shutters
